amendment.description: To reestablish the position of Vice Chief of the National Guard Bureau.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1749 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1749 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S8005-8017) To reestablish the position of Vice Chief of the National Guard Bureau.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1749 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1749 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
